column1: R(m,n,s) = {integers that can be expressed as the sum of m n-th powers in s or more ways}
column13: S(m,n,s) = {integers that can be expressed as the sum of m n-th powers in exactly s ways}

column1: Alter uses r(m,n,s) to denote the least such solution
Powers do not need to be distinct, but are all positive
Solutions do not need to be primitive

column2: Indicates an empty set, no solution is possible
Indicates sequence is not present in the OEIS
Insufficient terms in R to distinguish from S
Sequences created as part of this project
Indicates the sequence is known to be finite
Indicates the sequence is implemented in jOEIS
